author: terence0083
content: Quick question, if I take the pinned kurtosis config and latest commit of ethereum-package, am I supposed to see more than 6 blobs in electra? I'm only using geth as EL at this moment, another way to ask this is does it use the latest genesis json

author: lightclient
content: iâ€™m not sure version of geth the config would run but unless itâ€™s one of our prague-devnet-5 branches, we would still have max=6 hardcoded

author: parithosh
content: If you use the pinned version in this channel then yes it will use > 6 blobs ðŸ™‚ Its using sina's branch for now, but yeah using lightclient's branch would also achieve the same outcome

author: parithosh
content: Our default for electra in the genesis generator now is 6/9 at electra_fork_epoch, the `spamoor_blob_params` specifies the blob spammer config. It'll try to fill up the queue so there's 10 blobs in the pool. So we should be at target more often than not.

author: terence0083
content: thanks a lot guys, confirming it works for prysm
